reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THESE ARE PERFECTLY ACCEPTABLE
reviews.reviewText: It is unbelievable what name brand paper goods cost anymore (along with everything else!) so I decided to give these basic tissues a try due to the good reviews. These tissues feel as soft and thick as the name brands but with a much lower price tag. They are also less expensive than the value tissues I was getting at the supermarket and are of much better quality. I am very happy and will continue to purchase these tissues. Plus, it's so convenient to have bulky items like these delivered right to my door, rather than dragging them home.

reviews.reviewerName: This is not a ginger ale!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An exceptional product for everyday use
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a reliable and convenient facial tissue option, this pack of 2880 count is an excellent choice.The first thing that impressed me about this facial tissue is its quality and durability. Despite being an affordable option, the Amazon Basics brand maintains its commitment to producing high-quality products. The tissue is made from soft and absorbent 2-ply material that feels gentle against the skin. It provides the necessary strength and thickness to handle various uses without tearing or falling apart.The pack includes a generous count of 2880 tissue sheets, divided into 18 packs of 160 tissues each. This ensures that you have an ample supply of facial tissues for an extended period. Whether you need them for personal use, in the office, or for other everyday needs, this pack offers convenience and eliminates the frequent need for replenishment.The individual packs are compact and portable, making it easy to carry them in your bag, purse, or pocket. This allows for on-the-go convenience and ensures that you always have tissues readily available when needed. The compact size of the packs also makes storage effortless, whether you keep them in a drawer, on a countertop, or in a tissue box cover.The Amazon Basics Facial Tissue is versatile and suitable for a range of uses. It is gentle enough for everyday facial care, including wiping away tears, cleaning the face, or managing a runny nose. The 2-ply construction provides an extra layer of thickness and absorbency, making it suitable for handling minor spills, dabbing away moisture, or even light cleaning tasks.The tissues are unscented, which is ideal for individuals who prefer a fragrance-free option. They are also hypoallergenic, making them suitable for sensitive skin. The absence of dyes or fragrances ensures that the tissues are gentle and safe to use on all skin types.In terms of value for money, the Amazon Basics Facial Tissue offers an affordable option without compromising on quality. The pack provides a substantial quantity of tissues at a budget-friendly price, making it an economical choice for both personal and professional use.In conclusion, the Amazon Basics Facial Tissue, 2-Ply, 2880 Count is an exceptional product that offers reliability, convenience, and affordability. With its soft and absorbent 2-ply construction, generous pack size, portability, and versatility, this facial tissue pack provides everything you need for everyday use. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on the go, these tissues will exceed your expectations and ensure that you have a reliable solution for all your facial care needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The picture says it all. This seemed to be a good value for the quantity. However I will not be repurchasing due to all the lint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really good tissues
reviews.reviewText: These come in a 4 pack and are really good tissues. Strong and absorbent but still soft. I like the plain white due to skin allergies of some dies. I go through a lot of tissues due to allergies. I couldn't find any in the store that was reasonably priced and once again Amazon came through for me. When I need more I will order them again. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are good quality facial tissues, and the price is great too. I bought a box full of these for extra storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised at quality
reviews.reviewText: I'm having to cut back on spending. I decided to give these tissues a try. They are soft, strong. I'm very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plain colors go with any decor
reviews.reviewText: Really like the plain color box, price, and amount, and quality. My husband currently has a respiratory condition producing a lot of need for tissues and these work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but not soft
reviews.reviewText: It's cheaper than other brands like puffs but not as soft I think. If you have sensitive nose or skin, maybe not for you.
